original_text: Before he left, he asked ten of his servants to come to him. He gave each of them ten pounds of silver. “Use this money to get more money for me while I am away,” he said.
korean_text: 그 종 열을 불러 은화 열 므나를 주며 이르되 내가 돌아올 때까지 장사하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: he asked ten of his servants to come to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 종 열 명을 자신에게 오라고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: He gave each of them ten pounds of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 각 사람에게 은 열 파운드를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: to get more money for me
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 위해 더 많은 돈을 얻으려고
